auras.name: Rallying Cry of the Dragonslayer
auras.description: Increases critical chance of spells by 10%, melee and ranged by 5% and grants 140 attack power. 120 minute duration.

auras.name: Spirit of Zandalar
auras.description: Increases movement speed by 10% and all stats by 15% for 2 hours.

auras.name: Songflower Serenade
auras.description: Increases chance for a melee, ranged, or spell critical by 5% and all attributes by 15 for 1 hour.

auras.name: Warchief's Blessing
auras.description: Increases hitpoints by 300. 15% haste to melee attacks. 10 mana regen every 5 seconds.

auras.name: Fengus' Ferocity
auras.description: Attack power increased by 200.

auras.name: Moldar's Moxie
auras.description: Overall Stamina increased by 15%.

auras.name: Slipkik's Savvy
auras.description: Chance for a critical hit with a spell increased by 3%.

auras.name: Sayge's Dark Fortune of Damage
auras.description: Increases damage by 10%.

auras.name: Battle Squawk
auras.description: Attack speed increased by 5%.

auras.name: Battle Stance
auras.description: A balanced combat stance that generates rage when the warrior is hit, as well as when the warrior strikes an opponent.

auras.name: Defensive Stance
auras.description: A defensive combat stance. Decreases damage taken by 10% and damage caused by 10%. Increases threat generated.

auras.name: Berserker Stance
auras.description: An aggressive stance. Critical hit chance is increased by 3% and all damage taken is increased by 10%.

auras.name: Leader of the Pack
auras.description: Increases ranged and melee critical chance by 3%.

auras.name: Mark of the Wild
auras.description: Increases armor by 384, all attributes by 16 and all resistances by 27.

auras.name: Power Word: Fortitude
auras.description: Increases Stamina by 54.

auras.name: Trueshot Aura
auras.description: Attack power increased by 100.

auras.name: Greater Blessing of Kings
auras.description: Increases stats by 10%.

auras.name: Greater Blessing of Might
auras.description: Increases melee attack power by 186.

auras.name: Greater Blessing of Salvation
auras.description: Reduces threat generated by 30%.

auras.name: Grace of Air
auras.description: Increases Agility by 77.

auras.name: Strength of Earth
auras.description: Increases Strength by 70.

auras.name: Tranquil Air
auras.description: Reduces threat caused by 20%.

auras.name: Windfury Totem
auras.description: Summons a Windfury Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem enchants all party members main-hand weapons with wind, if they are within 20 yards. Each hit has a 20% chance of granting the attacker 1 extra attacks with 315 extra attack power. Lasts 1.50 min.

auras.name: Elemental Sharpening Stone
auras.description: Increase critical chance on a melee weapon by 2% for 30 minutes.

auras.name: Dense Sharpening Stone
auras.description: Increase sharp weapon damage by 8 for 30 minutes.

auras.name: Consecrated Sharpening Stone
auras.description: While applied to target weapon it increases attack power against undead by 100. Lasts for 1 hour.

auras.name: Grilled Squid
auras.description: Use: Restores 874.8 health over 27 sec. Must remain seated while eating. If you eat for 10 seconds will also increase your Agility by 10 for 10 min.

auras.name: Blessed Sunfruit
auras.description: Use: Restores 1933.2 health over 27 sec. Must remain seated while eating. Also increases your Strength by 10 for 10 min.

auras.name: Smoked Desert Dumplings
auras.description: Use: Restores 2148 health over 30 sec. Must remain seated while eating. If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become well fed and gain 20 Strength for 15 min.

auras.name: Elixir of Giants
auras.description: Use: Increases your Strength by 25 for 1 hour. (3 Sec Cooldown)

auras.name: Juju Power
auras.description: Use: Increases the target's Strength by 30 for 30 min. (1 Min Cooldown)

auras.name: Winterfall Firewater
auras.description: Use: Increases your melee attack power by 35 and size for 20 min. (1 Min Cooldown)

auras.name: Juju Might
auras.description: Use: Increases attack power by 40 for 10 min. (1 Min Cooldown)

auras.name: Elixir of Greater Agility
auras.description: Use: Increases Agility by 25 for 1 hour. (3 Sec Cooldown)

auras.name: Elixir of the Mongoose
auras.description: Use: Increases Agility by 25 and chance to get a critical hit by 2% for 1 hour. (3 Sec Cooldown)

auras.name: Ground Scorpok Assay
auras.description: Use: Increases Agility by 25 when consumed. Effect lasts for 60 minutes. (1 Hour Cooldown)

auras.name: R.O.I.D.S.
auras.description: Use: Increases Strength by 25 when consumed. Effect lasts for 60 minutes. (1 Hour Cooldown)

auras.name: Essence of the Red
auras.description:
Restores 500 Mana per second.
Restores 50 Energy per second.
Generates 20 Rage per second.

auras.name: Fungal Bloom
auras.description:
Critical-hit chance increased by 50%.
Spell critical-hit chance increased by 60%.
Spells and abilities cause no threat.

auras.name: Sunder Armor
auras.description: Armor decreased by 2250.

auras.name: Expose Armor (Improved)
auras.description: Armor decreased by 2550.

auras.name: Curse of Recklessness
auras.description: Increases melee attack power by 90 and decreases armor by 640. Target will not flee and will ignore Fear and Horror effects.

auras.name: Faerie Fire
auras.description: Decreases armor by 505. Cannot stealth or turn invisible.

auras.name: Annihilator
auras.description: Armor reduced by 600.

auras.name: Gift of Arthas
auras.description: Increases physical damage taken by 8.
